title: Missions disappeared
body: Hello everyone, today I received my World's missions.I played 3 games and after the third my mission bar disappeared ...All gone.I did not completed them, and I tried everything hextech repair, initialized full repair but nothing  happened.So please any  other solutions? :(

replies.body: Hey that's strange!  Do you have a screenshot?  I see that you still have missions active for Dressed to Kill, Ultra Combo, as well as Seize Your Glory.  Is this still an issue?

Same here for me and my friend, too many players doing that missions so that is problem server is full probably for data of mission and collecting, you cant see them but it counts. I didnt saw and i got icon, now left only one baron to take :D
Thank you very much :) I did not think of that so if it counts it's fine :D
